input.sentences: on my way to work taking this long commute everyday .
this back road way should take away some of congested traffic .
this way is leading past all these abandon buildings .
coming this way sure does seems a lot less stressful .
looking out from a window at my workplace now that i have gotten here .
output.sentences: I pass the same road and same building every day.
I cross the same bridge into the city.
The one goog part though is the lovely clear views which help me to get motivated for the work day ahead.
